sumcalc module¶

class sumcalc.SumCalc(count_from, count_to)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Iterates over a range of numbers and adds them to another one using threads

Variables:
  • total (int) – Current number
  • lock – The lock
__init__(count_from, count_to)¶

Initializes the sum calculators variables

Parameters:count_to – the number the thread is supposed to count to, starting from 1
lock = <_thread.lock object at 0x00000000053C83F0>¶
run()¶

Adds the addend to total until the addend reaches the value of num

total = 4851¶
